articles.title: In Epstein’s ‘birthday book,’ a celebration of his lecherous exploits
articles.description:
“So many girls, so little time,” wrote an associate of Epstein. Such tributes are part of the “birthday book,” which was dedicated to Epstein on his 50th birthday in 2003.

The post In Epstein’s ‘birthday book,’ a celebration of his lecherous exploits appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Epstein's 2003 birthday book highlights his exploitation of young women, raising concerns about local safety.
The book includes tributes from associates, reflecting a culture of complicity among powerful individuals.
Boston residents are urged to remain vigilant and support initiatives against sexual exploitation.

articles.title: Aunt now caring for child of parents killed in Watertown murder-suicide
articles.description:
“She will be forever remembered for the love she gave so freely, and through Madeline, her beautiful spirit lives on.”

The post Aunt now caring for child of parents killed in Watertown murder-suicide appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Aunt takes custody of child after Watertown murder-suicide involving parents.
The incident occurred in September 2025, leaving the child orphaned.
Community mourns loss while supporting the aunt and child during this transition.
